> No phone was found. Try Bluetooth pairing the phone to which you want to send the route and retry the route sending.\n
> Bluetooth is turned off. Try turning it on and retry sending route.\n
> The app has not been granted permission to use Bluetooth. Try to grant permissions and retry the route sending.\n
All route files have been received. You can go back to the main screen.
Bluetooth adapter not detected. The device cannot receive routes.
A technical error occurred while accepting the connection via Bluetooth:
Incoming Bluetooth connection has been accepted.
Waiting for communication - you should start sending the route from another, connected via Bluetooth device.
A technical error occurred while establishing a connection via Bluetooth:
A route has been sent via Bluetooth
There was a technical error while sending the route:
One device that can be sent a route has been detected (shown at the bottom of the screen).
Bluetooth route sending. It may take several minutes ... Please wait for the message that the transmission is completed.
Waiting for transmission of the next file...
A technical error occurred while establishing a connection:
Not all permissions used by the application have been granted. Do you want to go back to granting permissions?
Permissions are needed to prepare hints in the form of photos and sound recordings.
Permission is needed to do a commemorative photo with treasure finding.
Location permission is essential for gameplay.
The permission to access Bluetooth is needed to transfer routes between devices.
"> Select the device to which you want to send the route. Sending will only be successful if there is an active connection to the selected device.\n > List of paired devices: \n"
Scan the QR code representing the treasure.
The treasure [%s] was marked as collected.
The GPS did not let to identify which treasure was found. Mark it manually.
Facebook app not found. Please make sure that you have installed the Facebook app and granted the necessary permissions.
An error occurred while sharing content. The Facebook application responded with:
Please select the route you would like to share
It is not possible to share shit route
There is currently nothing to share. You can only share routes where the searching has already begun.
External storage permission is required for exporting game progress into an image.
The file has been saved successfully. You can locate it in images

We invite you on a special journey through a seemingly ordinary village. Our guide will be Mr. Andrzej Legrand, a resident of Kalinowice and a lover of local history. Thanks to him, we will learn about the biggest local secrets and discover priceless treasures of knowledge.
The exact route depends on your choices, but you can expect it to be about 13 km long. Consider breaking the journey into a few days or using a bike.
During the game, you need to find hidden treasures represented by QR codes. They will look like the one shown below:
To discover the secrets behind the QR code, you need to scan it by pressing:

The game will help us by telling how many steps in a straight line are left to the treasure and whether to go north, south, east, or west. But you have to find the directions by yourself. Don’t worry because you can find hints under these buttons:
There are several treasures to find. You can change the one you are currently searching for by pressing this button:
